metadatas.title: Home
metadatas.description: NextJS SaaS starter kit for rapid development: focus solely on the core features, be assured with a modern frontend, scalable and secure backend. Save effort

Billing.title: Subscription
Billing.trial-days-remaining: You have {varIntlDays} day(s) of trial remaining
Billing.subscription-will-be-canceled-at: Your subscription will be permanently canceled on

tooltips.cancel-subscription: Your subscription will be permanently canceled at the end of the billing period on {varIntlDate}. You can continue to use your features until this date. Furthermore, you can always reactivate your subscription in the meantime at no extra cost.
tooltips.restart-subscription: Your subscription will restart without any additional charge.

Billing.no-plan-subscribed-yet: You have not subscribed to any plan yet

Purchases.title: Purchases
Purchases.no-purchase-history-description: You have not purchased any products on our site yet!

throws.cancel-subscription: A problem occurred during the subscription cancellation

throws.already-in-an-organization: The user is already a member of an organization.

TeamInvitationPage.invited-with-different-email: You are logged in with a different email address than the one that received the invitation.
TeamInvitationPage.please-logout: Please log in with the corresponding email address and return to this page. If you do not have an account with the invited address, log out and return to this page to create it.
TeamInvitationPage.logged-in-with-right-email: You are logged in with the correct email address, but you need to log out and log back in to accept the invitation.

TeamInvitationPage.invitation-accepted: Invitation accepted, please create an account and log in to finalize the invitation. You will be redirected to the account creation page.

Welcome {varIntlName}! Thank you for your trust. You will receive an email with a link to confirm its validity.

UserUsage.FeatureNotLinkedToPlan: Feature not linked to the user's subscribed plan
UserUsage.FeatureNotActive: Feature disabled on the user's subscribed plan
UserUsage.SubscriptionStartDateNotFound: No subscription start date found for this user
UserUsage.NotEnoughCreditToUseFeature: You have reached the limit of {varIntlCreditAlloued} monthly uses for this feature.
UserUsage.NotEnoughCreditRemainingToUseFeature: You do not have enough {varIntlCreditName} to use this feature. You only have {varIntlCreditRemaining} left and you need {varIntlCreditAlloued} {varIntlCreditName} to use it.
UserUsage.SaasSettingsNotFound: Important site settings could not be found. Please try again.
UserUsage.ActiveSubscriptionNotFoundForUser: No active subscription was found for you. Please try again or contact technical support.
UserUsage.StripeSubscriptionItemIdNotFound: No Stripe subscription found. Please try again or contact technical support.
UserUsage.SubscriptionRecurringUsageTypeNotMetered: Operation canceled. Your subscription terms do not allow for the usage of this feature to be metered. Please contact technical support.
UserUsage.StripeUsageNotReported: Operation canceled. The feature usage could not be reported to our billing service (Stripe) for the following reason: {varIntlError}.
UserUsage.Error: Operation canceled: the feature usage could not be reported. Please contact technical support.
